name: Forgotten City
description: Ruined buildings and overgrown streets where the wind whispers ancient secrets. This long-abandoned city hides many mysteries and dangers, as well as rare artifacts of ancient civilizations.

name: Deep Space
description: The boundless cosmos, full of unexplored planets, stars, and black holes. Players can explore distant galaxies, encounter new life forms, and face cosmic anomalies.

name: Age of Dragons
description: A world where dragons rule the skies, and humanity struggles for survival. Here, players can become dragon slayers, wizards, or learn ancient spells to tame these mighty creatures.

name: Underwater Kingdom
description: A mysterious world under the water, ruled by sea creatures and sunken cities. Players can explore underwater caves, find lost treasures, and interact with marine inhabitants.

name: Post-Apocalyptic Landscape
description: The Earth after a global catastrophe, where survivors struggle for resources. Destroyed cities and abandoned factories create a grim atmosphere of survival amidst the ruins of civilization.

name: Enchanted Forest
description: A magical forest full of wonders and dangers. Home to fairies, witches, and other mythical creatures. Players can embark on a journey to uncover the secrets of this mysterious place.

name: Medieval Castle
description: The era of knights and princesses, where each castle hides its own secrets and intrigues. Players can participate in knightly tournaments, battles for power, or explore dark dungeons.

name: Secret Laboratory
description: A modern laboratory where experiments are conducted on the edge of science and fantasy. Players can encounter unknown technologies, genetically modified creatures, and mysterious conspiracies.

name: Desert Oasis
description: A picturesque oasis in the midst of a lifeless desert. This place can be a refuge for travelers or a battleground for fights over water and resources in the harsh desert conditions.

name: City of the Future
description: A high-tech city of the future with flying cars, robots, and advanced technologies. Here, players can face technological wonders and moral dilemmas of societal development.
